document_data.caption: A digester lets loose a concentrated stream of [[acid]]
document_data.name: Digester
document_data.mainbody: '''Digesters''' were a ravenous, predatory species of [[magical beast]]s.
document_data.Description: These creatures stood on average {{SI|5|ft|long=yes}} in height upon two powerful hind legs and weighed around {{SI|350|lb|k|long=yes}}. Their bodies sported a long tail, had a grey pebbly hide with [[dagger]]-like markings that helped them to camouflaged, and overall measured {{SI|7|ft|long=yes}} in length. Their heads were narrow with sucking mouths and sported a tube-like orifice on their forehead.
document_data.Behavior: Digesters had a ravenous appetite, rarely feeling full, but when they were the beasts laid low and tried to avoid other creatures.
document_data.Abilities:
Digesters were capable of seeing in both areas of [[low-light vision|low-light]] and [[darkvision|total darkness]]. They were also impervious to harm from [[acid]].

These creatures were capable of shooting acid from the tube-like they sported on their foreheads, either spraying it out in a cone of roughly {{SI|20|ft|long=yes}} or as a concentrated stream out to {{SI|5|ft|long=yes}}. Once a digester used this function they had to wait some time before they could spray again.
document_data.Combat: When a digester spotted a likely target they would charge at them and spray their acid. If they found that was not sufficient to kill their prey, a digester would then attack with their hind legs until they were able to use their acid spray once more.
document_data.History:
Around [[1372 DR]], a digester roamed the valley of [[High Thorog]] after having been freed from [[Telkoun's Tower]].

A year later, it was found that [[Quon's shop]] in [[Zhentil Keep]] held a digester in its kennels.<ref>

Ecology.Habitats:
[[File:Mhair Jungles.jpg|thumb|273px|''A digester attacks a [[yuan-ti abomination]] in the Mhair Jungles.'']]
Digesters were typically found to inhabit forests within warm climates.

In the [[Shining South]] region of [[south Faerûn]], packs of these creatures inhabited the [[Lluirwood]],<ref> the [[Shaareach Forest]],<ref> and the northern [[Mhair Jungles]].<ref><ref> In [[interior Faerûn]], they could be found in the [[Vast Swamp]].<ref>
